reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Yes returned again to see Bonnie.
reviews.title: Still Super Duper. 5*

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As we said to Bonnie,we could not visualize going to Taupo and not stay there.
reviews.title: Lovely and comfortable stay and conversations with little Bonnie

reviews.text: Its still GREAT. what more can we say on our 3rd Visit. except it must be good.Still perfect with Bonnie looking after you. See other people Reviews and our previous ones "Cant say more ''
reviews.title: Incredible Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Re eating out in the evenings. We tried Portifino's (Italian+ BYO ) Crooked Door and Mole and Chicken.
reviews.title: Incomparable beautiful
memorable stay
reviews.text: PS great bakery across the road especially the mince pies.
